definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
see 賊眉鼠眼|贼眉鼠眼[zei2 mei2 shu3 yan3]

sentences.english: Anyway, they had mean eyes, I thought.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎麼說，我覺得他們有點賊眉賊眼的。

sentences.english: That guy is very suspicious, his shifty eyes move constantly.
sentences.chinese: 那個人十分可疑，瞪着賊眼左顧右盼的。
